WorkItem.Description:
In VC8, there was atlperf.h to simplify provisoning of performance counter but it has been removed... please provide us a sample showing how to provide performance counter using both version 1.0 and 2.0
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Sample request: providing performance counters in VC10

Comments.Message:
Hello 

Most of the ATL Server code base(including performance monitoring classes in atlperf.h) has been released as a shared source project on CodePlex and is not installed as part of Visual Studio 2008.
http://atlserver.codeplex.com/

To get more information, please see:
http://blogs.msdn.com/vcblog/archive/2007/01/19/atl-server-visual-c-shared-source-software.aspx

Please let me know if the above information is helpful to you.

Yes, I know the ATL server code is available, but it is old (almost 4 years), it has problem with VC10 and/or Vista, especially on the performance part (take a look at issue tracker) and it only covers the version 1 performance counters, so please provide at least a sample of version 2 (even if a sample of both would be great to compare the two methods)
